# Greater Weapon Focus (Feat)
## Overview
Choose one type of weapon (including unarmed strike or grapple) for which you have already selected [[Weapon Focus (Feat)|Weapon Focus]]. You are a master at your chosen weapon.

**Prerequisites**: Proficiency with selected weapon, [[Weapon Focus (Feat)|Weapon Focus]] with selected weapon, base attack bonus +1, 8th-level fighter.

**Benefit**: You gain a +1 bonus on attack rolls you make using the selected weapon. This bonus stacks with other bonuses on attack rolls, including those from [[Weapon Focus (Feat)|Weapon Focus]].

**Special**: You can gain Greater Weapon Focus multiple times. Its effects do not stack. Each time you take the feat, it applies to a new type of weapon.

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 126
